tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE signature_features (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    signature_feature1 VARCHAR(255),
    signature_feature2 VARCHAR(255),
    signature_feature3 VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50),
	password VARCHAR(50),
	signature_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (signature_id) REFERENCES signature_features(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE authentication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    authentication_time TIMESTAMPTZ,
    authentication_result BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE signature_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    signature_id UUID REFERENCES signatures(signature_id),
    action VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);
